template.description: Makumba taglib directive required for using makumba tag library
template.name: Makumba taglib directive

template.description: JSP file with Makumba taglib directive and html markup
template.name: New Makumba JSP File (html)

templates.template: <%@ page language="java" contentType="text/html; charset=${encoding}" pageEncoding="${encoding}"%> <%@ taglib uri="http://www.makumba.org/presentation" prefix="mak" %> <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd"> <html> <head> <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=${encoding}"> <title>Insert title here</title> </head> <body> ${cursor} </body> </html>

template.description: JSP file with Makumba taglib directive and html markup
template.name: New Makumba JSP File (html)

templates.template: <%@ taglib uri="http://www.makumba.org/presentation" prefix="mak" %> <!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/html4/loose.dtd"> <html> <head> <title>Insert title here</title> </head> <body> ${insert} </body> </html>
